name: ThePrideParade
description:
You have to take the Pride Parade from the start point to the end point. On the way there are houses (which help you to gather more people), cops (they send some people away), football stadium (some people get distracted into the game) and ice-cream parlors (some people get distracted to have ice-cream).

Your objective is to find a path such as you take the largest parade to the end point in just 20 seconds.

P.S. - My high score is 300

Created by-

HARSH FATEPURIA (1st year MS CS- University of Southern California)

RAHUL AGRAWAL (1st year MS CS- University of Southern California)
